cast.overview: Cal Weaver is living the American dream. He has a good job, a beautiful house, great children and a beautiful wife, named Emily. Cal's seemingly perfect life unravels, however, when he learns that Emily has been unfaithful and wants a divorce. Over 40 and suddenly single, Cal is adrift in the fickle world of dating. Enter, Jacob Palmer, a self-styled player who takes Cal under his wing and teaches him how to be a hit with the ladies.
cast.title: Crazy, Stupid, Love.

details.biography: Rebecca Flinn-White is an American actress. She is married to Zak White, who is also her writing partner.
details.name: Rebecca Flinn-White
